channel.title: Shortcodes on rambler.tw
channel.description: Recent content in Shortcodes on rambler.tw

item.title: Icons
item.description: Blowfish has built-in support for a number of FontAwesome 6 icons. These can be included in your website through either the icon partial or icon shortcode. Additionally, custom icons are also fully supported.

item.title: Shortcodes
item.description: In addition to all the default Hugo shortcodes, Blowfish adds a few extras for additional functionality. Alert # alert outputs its contents as a stylised message box within your article. It’s useful for drawing attention to important information that you don’t want the reader to miss.

item.title: Charts
item.description: Blowfish includes Chart.js for powerful charts and data visualisations.
